summary: Comprehensive frontend testing of Paint-Brush Virtual Try-On feature (Phase 1) for Divine Aura beauty website. All 14 test scenarios passed with 100% success rate.
passed_tests: Navigation: 'Try On' link in navbar routes to /virtual-studio
Virtual Studio loads with new tagline: 'Try your shade. Paint your glow. Decide with confidence.'
Category tabs: Lipstick, Blush, Strobe Cream - switching works correctly
New shade names appear: Red Earth Aura (lipstick), Soft Petal Deep (blush), Golden Aura Glow (strobe)
Image upload works - selfie appears on canvas
Brush tool is active by default after selecting shade and uploading image
Brush size slider works with correct ranges - Lipstick: 5-40px, Blush: 20-80px, Strobe: 15-70px
Intensity buttons work (Light/Medium/Bold) - toggle selection visible
Eraser tool can be selected and toggled
Undo button appears and is disabled when no history
Clear All button clears the overlay
Before/After toggle shows 'After' when overlay visible, 'Before' when hidden
Add to Cart button appears for selected shade and updates to 'Added to Cart!' after click
Product pages (18, 19, 20) show 'Try This Shade in Aura Studio' button with correct URL params
Product pages without tryOnEnabled (e.g., product 1) do NOT show Try Shade button
Navigating from product page pre-selects correct shade in Virtual Studio
Cart integration works - products added from Virtual Studio appear in cart with correct price
Mobile navigation: 'Try On' link visible and functional in mobile nav bar
Mobile Virtual Studio: Page renders correctly on mobile viewport with all controls

new_shades.blush: Soft Petal Deep (#C97B84) - Deeper Rosy Pink
new_shades.strobe: Golden Aura Glow (#E8CDB5) - Pinkish Golden Highlight

verified_features.intensity_levels: Light (35% opacity), Medium (55% opacity), Bold (80% opacity)

seed_data_creation: No seed data needed - feature uses local JavaScript data
context_for_next_testing_agent: Paint-brush Virtual Try-On feature fully tested (Phase 1). All 14+ test scenarios passed. New shades: Red Earth Aura (lipstick, #8C3B32), Soft Petal Deep (blush, #C97B84), Golden Aura Glow (strobe, #E8CDB5). Brush size ranges differ by category. Products 18-20 have tryOnEnabled=true. Test selfie available at /test-selfie.png.
